title: The Esther Code
description: Silence of the Lambs meets the Da Vinci Code in this psychological thriller where FBI agent Jamie Golding is on the trail of a serial killer who is murdering elderly men and leaving cryptic messages from a 2,500 year-old hidden code. Jamie must decipher the code in order to stop the killer in this suspenseful page-turner. The killer's intention is to "play the FBI like a violin" as a game of cat and mouse ensues. The Esther Code that Jamie discovers is real and is masterfully presented in a way that will leave the biggest skeptic scratching their head.
author: Michael Danneman
